docs.text: after sixteen years francis ford copolla has again returned to his favorite project , making the third installment in the godfather-trilogy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this new film has been underrated for no reason .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is as intellectual and majestically made as copolla's pervious films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is also more psychological , pessimistic and more tragic than the first two .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the only regret is the unconvincing performance by the newcomer sofia copolla and some " unfinished " developments of some characters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film elegantly begins with nino rota's recognizable musical score , the beautiful skyscrapers of new york and michael's voice as he is writing a letter to his children : " the only wealth in this world is children .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: more than all money and power on earth , you are my treasure " .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the year is 1979 and michael corleone has used the time since the ending of " part ii " to make his father's dream come true - making the corleone family legitimate .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michael sold all his casinos and invests only in gambling .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: constantly haunted by the past , his only reason to live is his children .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the family has amassed unimaginable wealth , and as the film opens michael corleone ( al pacino ) is being invested with a great honor by the church .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: later that day , at a reception , his daughter announces a corleone family gift to the church and the charities of sicily , " a check in the amount of $100 million . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the corleones are about to find , as others have throughout history , that you cannot buy forgiveness .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sure , you can do business with evil men inside the church , for all men are fallible and capable of sin .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but god does not take payoffs .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the plot of the movie , concocted by coppola and mario puzo in a screenplay inspired by headlines , brings the corleone family into the inner circles of corruption in the vatican .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is a moment in " godfather iii " where michael says : " all my life i have been trying to go up in society , where everything was legal .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the higher i go , the crookier it becomes . . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: visually this film is as spectacular as the first two .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gordon willis' rich cinematography , carmine copolla's beautiful composition and alex tavoularis' wonderful art direction could not be better .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but copolla's first two godfather-films were more famous for their deep , intellectual plots , tree dimensional characters and incredible acting , than for their visual perfection .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the third installment has only the plot and visuals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some characters could be much more developed and the acting , although good , never accomplishes to reach the same height of the first two films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the biggest miscasting is sofia copolla , who is so unconvincing and unemotional that she manages to ruin several scenes throughout the movie , that could have been grander and more emotional .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the best performance comes unsurprisingly from al pacino , who should have got a nomination for best actor at the oscars .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: andy garcia is powerful as sonny's son , strong , focused and loyal .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: violence is natural to him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he suffers no pangs of conscience when he takes revenge on his family's behalf , and in this he is supposed to be strong in the uncomplicated way don vito corleone was .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however both kay ( diane keaton ) and connie ( talia shire ) are useless .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and characters like vito corleone and tom hagen are really missed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the good part is that michael is again reunited with old friends , that you remember from the first and second films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the third film michael has become almost like his father , vito in the first film and vincenzo resembles michael when he was much younger .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this parallel could be more interesting if vincenzo's character was more developed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many have pointed out that making the third film , was unnecessary .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i disagree .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is a beautiful film of great importance , completing the tragic saga of the corleone family .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the first film showed some horrible results of corleone's life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it showed michael making a choice ; the second showed a man damning himself for his choices and feeling the impact of changing times .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a man desperately trying to keep his balance , focus , family and sanity , while everything is crashing all around him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the third film is a terrifying conclusion - a result of michael's life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the life he chose for himself is like quicksand - one wrong step and you are doomed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is no turning back .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and no matter how hard you try to get out of it , to free yourself , no matter how powerful and wealthy you are , you are helpless - sinking deeper and deeper till it swallows you completely .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the beautifully directed last sequence is also the powerful climax of the film , when michael is sitting alone in his chair , left by everyone , surrounded by emptiness and memories of his friends and family members long dead .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: here he dies - alone , miserable and unforgiven
docs.label: positive
